doc.field: Materials related to safety issues at WTC project, 2001-2002: Binder of "Instruction Kit, WTC Emergency Project, New Employee Orientation Training" from NYC Building & Construction Trades Council and the Building Trades Association; employee orientation hand-out packets; Powerpoint slides of WTC new employee orientation; Center to Protect Workers' Rights orientation packet; WTC Recovery Task Force procedure document (including procedure for recovery of remains). NYC Department of Design & Construction (DDC) WTC Emergency Project Environmental, Safety, and Health Plan (2 copies of revision 1, Feb 7, 2002). DoL hand-outs on silica safety. NYCHA interim site assessment report for 90 Church St (Nov 2001). NY State DoL results of personal air sampling at WTC (anonymized), Dec 2001. Original signed WTC Emergency Project Partnership Agreement between OSHA and representatives of various NYC agencies, companies, etc., 2001. OSHA FDNY Personal Sample summary (no names). Liberty Mutual PPE Safety Survey. Some news items and product info re: worker safety at WTC. Artifacts: "America Responds/Heroes of 2001" sheets of postal stamps, some stamped first day of issue, with related program for release. (Includes Artifacts)
